name: Jolly Match
description:
Game in progress. 95% of game done. To the mid of April full release will be available.

Classic Match3 game on Android. CURRENTLY AVAILABLE 35/100 levels.

You're playing as Shea - young girl from a small village. For most of your life you helped your mother by picking magic mushrooms in the nearby forest. Until one of the most famous Shromanceress cames to your village...

Any comments, suggestions and bugs founded will be much appreciated <3.
